thread.section_title: Manufacturer Express, Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Manufacturer Express, Inc. | mfrexpress.com
thread.title: Ryan Alcorn
thread.title_full: Manufacturer Express, Inc. reviewed by Ryan Alcorn

author: Ryan Alcorn
title: Ryan Alcorn
text:
First, MFR Express was the first supplier I found after a long internet search for the part I needed, and at a better price than the competing suppliers that had similar, unsuitable (too small) products.
Second: After a small confusion with the catalogue and a mistaken order, the company sent me the correct part free of charge and did not require me to return the wrong part. That's going the extra mile
